GSD.product_version: versions from v3.8 to before v4.14.257
GSD.description:
scsi: mpt3sas: Fix kernel panic during drive powercycle test

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.257 by commit dd035ca0e7a142870a970d46b1d19276cfe2bc8c, it was introduced in version v3.8 by commit f92363d12359498f9a9960511de1a550f0ec41c2. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: scsi: mpt3sas: Fix kernel panic during drive powercycle test
